description: Detects the use of various web request methods (including aliases) via Windows PowerShell command
false_positives: Use of Get-Command and Get-Help modules to reference Invoke-WebRequest and Start-BitsTransfer.
name: Windows PowerShell Web Request
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Invoke\-WebRequest* OR *iwr\ * OR *wget\ * OR *curl\ * OR *Net.WebClient* OR *Start\-BitsTransfer*) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Path:C\:\\Packages\\Plugins\\Microsoft.GuestConfiguration.ConfigurationforWindows\\*)))
author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573
